Frequently Asked Questions

Q1. Why dog  BARC?

ANSWER 1:

Because all dogs can be trained - young and old. Computerized training produces the best long-term results - for dog and owner. Calming, mental stimulation for your dog. Anti-anxiety medication-free for Life!

Q2. What is the dog  BARC method?

ANSWER 2:

Firmly in the camp of positive reinforcement training, dog  BARC is rooted in science. We have more than 50 years of scientific practice in our founding team. dog  BARC technology reliably stimulates and calms your dog - providing a lifetime feeding and training buddy for when your dog should be resting happy in the family home.

Q3. Will technology affect my relationship with my dog?

ANSWER 3:

Yes, if you try to simply replace quality one-on-one time with any one of the various PetTech products on the market. However...

NO, not if you introduce dog  BARC technology to fix critical destructive behaviors within the family home. By removing worrysome and frustrating behaviors, dog  BARC frees you up to fully enjoy and interact with your dog.
